Reviews.Title: Works effectively, Doesn't Come with any documentation
Reviews.Author: Neal Merchant
Reviews.Content: It's a good quick and easy way to record stuff for meetings, etc. It actually has a functional pen which is cool and includes 8gb microSD which is also quite nice. You will need a mini-USB cable or microSD card reader to get the videos out though. All around, can't complain, pretty good.

Reviews.Title: I liked how I was able to connect the pen to ...
Reviews.Author: cindy
Reviews.Content: Received the spy pen and have been playing with it. The videos record in much higher quality and resolution than the other spy pens I've used in the past. I liked how I was able to connect the pen to my computer with the USB cable to view my videos and pictures. I also liked the silver color vs gold color pens but that's a personal preference.Pros:- Very high quality video resolution, it records in 720p HD.- 8GB SD Card included- USB cable included for easy and quick connection to computer to view videos and picturesCons:- Pen wasn't writing, not sure if it was just mine but wasn't my main purpose for buying it.- Slightly bulky, I prefer smaller pens- Took a couple tries to get video to record.Overall, I love this pen for the amazing video quality. Others I've bought claim HD quality but later found out the video to be very grainy.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use 720p Spy Pen Does it All!  Move Over, James Bond & Q
Reviews.Author: DasShopaholic "Out-of-hand shopaholic"
Reviews.Content: I received news that LiBa was going to release this product in time for the holiday season, and I couldn't wait to purchase and finally get my hands on it.  Having grown up with James Bond & Get Smart, why wouldn't I be intrigued by a spy pen that records both photos & videos?  It's like a childhood dream come true, 50 years later!It's quite amazing how sneaky this spy pen is.  Other than lacking any boutique branding, this pen looks like a Cross or a Mont Blanc at first glance.  The thick chrome ring in the middle of the pen is one giveaway that it isn't a fancy $100 pen.  I was also quite impressed with the weight and balance of the pen, as it felt like a substantial writing instrument.It may be easy to imagine how a pen with a single button may end up being difficult to operate, but to my surprise, the instructions explained it clearly, and I was capturing photos, videos, and even using it as webcam in no time.  In video mode, the spy pen records both video & audio.I think this spy pen may be one of the few on the market to record in 720p.  I can confirm that, when playing back the recorded video with VLC Media Player on my Windows notebook, that the Media Information does report back as 720p.  Also, the indoors and low-light performance were decent.It was very easy to connect, browse, and download files from the pen to the computer.  It shows up as an external storage folder in Windows.  No need to fight with irritating driver & software issues just to access your files.  LiBa's software was simple enough.I've been writing less and less over the years due to computers, but this high-quality feature-packed spy pen may make it more fun & interesting to start writing a lot more.

Reviews.Title: Works as Advertised!
Reviews.Author: James Reese "Chevalier James"
Reviews.Content: This spy pen records decent still pictures and videos with sound!  I am a private investigator, and I am looking forward to using this item in my work!

Reviews.Title: WOW and AMAZING! Quality Build Spy Pen
Reviews.Author: Ming
Reviews.Content: WOW and AMAZING! This is all I can say about this camera pen.  I've tested this pen for more than 3 weeks and it has not fail me.  Quality build and the pen writes perfectly.  Pen comes with a mini 8GB SD card (Kingston brand) and a 31" USB/mini USB cord.  Picture quality is amazing on this little thing.  Snapping a picture is simple and captures right away.  No waiting.  Video and sound quality is amazing too but don't move too fast with it because video can get choppy.  The instruction manual was very easy to follow.Super fast shipping and the item is well packaged.  Also, the customer service is outstanding very prompt in responses and love that they have a "No hassle 30 day money back guarantee".  It was worth the money paid and highly recommend this pen!

Reviews.Title: Liba Hidden Spy Pen Camers does not work will not load in computer.
Reviews.Author: RFB 1654
Reviews.Content: My computer tells me this product is defective and will not load into the computer.  I tried it in another computer with the same results as it will not load in the computer.  The product is worthless.  RFB 1634

Reviews.Title: Alright
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: First off, my review is based on my purchase from usasouthernstar and not LiBa. It isn't truly HD 720p quality. It is 640×480 with 1280×960 pictures. My pen cost me around $21 for the pen with 8gb micro SD card. Which is very good considering this pen writes records takes pictures and even comes with 8gb memory. I wasn't expecting HD quality, so I can say I am satisfied with my purchase. Overall it is pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Possible spyware on Micro SD Card.
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I ordered this initially based on the reviews. I tested the recording feature, then tried to connect the pen to the laptop via the supplied USB cable. It connected the first time, but wouldn't reconnect after using it further. Additionally, I noticed some strange popups within a few seconds of my second attempt to connect. Maybe this pen was a previous return that only had the obvious video and pictures deleted from the previous owner? Beware.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: randandlondon@compuserve.com
Reviews.Content: Got it and tried to clip it on and the clip broke.Technology is good and the idiot makers have put it in the cheapest , flimsiest possible container (pen). For another $1 they could have got it right - dumb idiots.
